document_data.mainbody:
Andar Beech was the High Artificer of Gond in Baldurs Gate during the late 15 century DR. He led over one hundred Gondar priests and acolytes within the grand High House of Wonders in the citys Temples District.
High Artificer Beech took over the post after the former head priest, Torlin Silvershield, was revealed to be an abomination of the returned deity Bhaal.
